name: Escape The UFO
description:
---- READ DESC ----

This is my first game jam submission! (for the weekly game jam).

This game is about a player who is stuck on a UFO. The aliens have taken over the earth and have captured this astronaut. Reach the control room alive to get back to earth!

Please provide feedback in the comments on how I can improve!

Move with WASD.

Shoot with Left Click.
